venue.name: GSU Conference Auditorium at Boston University

item.description:
BU Professor of International Relations and foreign policy expert Andrew Bacevich joins Stephen Prothero, BU Professor of Religion and author of “God is Not One,” for an evening of discussion on the Ground Zero mosque debate, the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and the relationship between religion and politics in the United States and abroad. Prothero and Bacevich will be available after the discussion to sign copies of their latest books, ‘God is Not One’ and ‘Washington Rules - America's Path to Permanent War’.

As described at http://www.bu.edu/php....
item.name: Discussion: Ground Zero Mosque Controversy
